name: Ninja Clash (FortDefender)
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a ninja? Well, now you can in this single-player and two-player game! Practice your controls and hone your training in single-player mode! If you want, you can aim to set the survival high score! You can go head-to-head against another ninja in two-player mode to see who is the most skilled! There are six normal maps to choose from and one secret map! 

Keep in mind ninjas, your special attacks will drain your health, but they will greatly damage your opponent if they land! Good luck training!
